tags.name: zui-shell
tags.description:
The Shell must wrap all `zui-shell` components in order for applications to render styles and functions correctly.

### Example
```html
<zui-shell app-name="ZUI Documentation" unresolved>
   <zui-shell-topbar unresolved></zui-shell-topbar>
   <zui-shell-nav unresolved></zui-shell-nav>
   <zui-shell-content unresolved></zui-shell-content>
   <zui-shell-footer unresolved></zui-shell-footer>
</zui-shell>
```

attributes.name: app-name
attributes.description: The user-friendly name for this application.

properties.name: appName
properties.description: The user-friendly name for this application.
